Bluebell Therapy

Judith Mason

A Nottingham based caring and confidential Counselling and Hypnotherapy service.

Find out more about

Hypnotherapy Counselling Workshops

About me

Hi, I’m Judith Mason and I run Bluebell Therapy, offering counselling and hypnotherapy. My practice room is in Beeston, where I live with my family and a couple of well-behaved pets. I trained to be a therapist several year ago, after 20 years’ experience as a teacher. In both my careers, I have been motivated by wanting to help and support people to reach their personal potential. I still love working with young people and now offer therapy to clients of all ages. I also teach trainee therapists for Chrysalis Courses, have experience as a secondary school counsellor and offer mental health workshops.

I’m really passionate about the benefits of counselling and hypnotherapy – they are fantastic tools for change and personal growth. I work with all sorts of issues but have a particular interest in anxiety disorders and phobias. Anxiety isn’t a life sentence … therapy can really help.

My qualifications and training:

  • Diploma in Hypnotherapy and Counselling (Distinction)
  • Advanced Diploma In Psychotherapeutic Counselling
  • Professional Diploma in Integrative Counselling
  • Professional accredited member of the National Hypnotherapy Society and National Counselling Society
  • PGCE in Primary Teaching
  • Additional training in various areas, including Self-harming behaviour, Suicide Awareness, Anxiety disorders, Depression.
  • Up to date DBS check.

Contact Me

If you would like a chat about how therapy can help you:
